articles.title: Demond Wilson, who played Lamont on ‘Sanford and Son,’ dies at 79
articles.description:
Mark Goldman, a publicist for Wilson, confirmed to The Associated Press that he died following complications from cancer on Friday.

The post Demond Wilson, who played Lamont on ‘Sanford and Son,’ dies at 79 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Demond Wilson, known for playing Lamont, died at 79 from cancer complications.
Wilson's passing was confirmed by publicist Mark Goldman on February 1, 2026.
His death may resonate with Boston's community, reflecting on the impact of classic television.

articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz beats Novak Djokovic to become the youngest man to complete a career Grand Slam
articles.description:
"Nobody knows how hard I’ve been working to get this trophy."

The post Carlos Alcaraz beats Novak Djokovic to become the youngest man to complete a career Grand Slam appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Carlos Alcaraz defeated Novak Djokovic to win the Grand Slam title.
Alcaraz, at 20 years old, becomes the youngest man to achieve a career Grand Slam.
Boston tennis fans celebrate a new era in men's tennis with Alcaraz's historic win.

articles.title: Epstein files lead to resignation in Slovakia and calls for former prince to cooperate
articles.description:
Making his first public comments about the release, Trump cast the documents as a vindication of his actions.

The post Epstein files lead to resignation in Slovakia and calls for former prince to cooperate appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Slovak Prime Minister resigned following the release of Epstein-related documents.
Calls for former Prince Andrew to cooperate with investigations have intensified.
Boston residents may see increased scrutiny on local ties to international figures.

articles.title: Judge orders 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his dad released from ICE detention
articles.description:
Liam and his father, Adrian Conejo Arias, who is originally from Ecuador, were detained in the Minneapolis suburb of Columbia Heights on Jan. 20.

The post Judge orders 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his dad released from ICE detention appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Judge orders release of 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father from ICE detention.
Liam and his dad, Adrian Conejo Arias, were detained on January 20 in Minnesota.
This ruling may influence local immigration policies affecting Boston families.
